Tucson moves quickly with Big Convoy and keeps his sword at the ready.  As =
Yoketron had taught him, he takes his challenge willingly but with an air o=
f calm.  He knew a clear mind had to be kept if he was going to perform at =
an optimal level.  After all, Yoketron had worked hard with Tucson, shaping=
 him up to be one of his star pupils.

" If it's all right with you, Big Co=
nvoy, I would like to handle the next group of guards.  I wouldn't want you=
 to drain your energy reserves too quickly.  Oh, nice shot by the way."

Pe=
rpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Oct 31, 2011, at 7:25 AM, S=
uper Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson pr=
epares for whatever may happen by taking his sword in hand.
> >
> > He then=
 looks to Big Convoy with a nodd of readiness.
> >
> > " I can see why you =
warned me, don't worry, I don't mind a challenge. A
> > challenge further s=
harpens the mind and perfects the skills."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> BIG CONVOY nodde=
d as the lift continued to move, its motion smooth and rapid.
> 
> LONG RAC=
K and SHARP EDGE disappeared through the panel in the cieling
> of the lift=
, first LONG RACK hoisted himself up with his crane-like
> extendedable arm=
, and then he helped SHARP EDGE up as well.
> 
> As they closed the panel i=
t left CONVOY, MACH KICK, BREAK and TUSCON
> alone in the lift as it began =
to slow and then finally stop.
> 
> As the door slid open it revealed a lon=
g hall ahead of them as well as
> one going in each direction left and righ=
t. From the looks of things
> it was the prison level but this one was diff=
erent, darker and older.
> 
> Two SHARKTICONS were standing at the door, th=
ier optics wide with
> surprise and even terror, it was obvious that they h=
ad intended to
> take the lift themselves, unaware of the occupants.
> 
> T=
wo blasts from CONVOY sent them slamming back and sliding across the
> floo=
r, thier chests smoking ruins, thier optics going black!
> 
> "Let's move!"=
 He said as he stepped over the offline shells of the
> SHARKTICONS and beg=
an to run down the hall.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-70-303816932

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Tucson moves quickly with Big Convoy a=
nd keeps his sword at the ready.  As Yoketron had taught him, he takes=
 his challenge willingly but with an air of calm.  He knew a clear min=
d had to be kept if he was going to perform at an optimal level.  Afte=
r all, Yoketron had worked hard with Tucson, shaping him up to be one of hi=
s star pupils.</div><div><br></div><div>" If it's all right with you, Big C=
onvoy, I would like to handle the next group of guards.  I wouldn't wa=
nt you to drain your energy reserves too quickly.  Oh, nice shot by th=
e way."<br><br>Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. </div><div=
><br>On Oct 31, 2011, at 7:25 AM, Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto:supe=
rcyclonus@...">supercyclonus@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><d=
iv></div><blockquote type=3D"cite"><div>




<span style=3D"display:none">&=
nbsp;</span>



    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>> <=
OLD><br>
><br>
> Tucson prepares for whatever may happen by taking=
 his sword in hand.<br>
><br>
> He then looks to Big Convoy with a no=
dd of readiness.<br>
><br>
> " I can see why you warned me, don't wor=
ry, I don't mind a challenge.  A<br>
> challenge further sharpens the mi=
nd and perfects the skills."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
BIG CONVOY nodde=
d as the lift continued to move, its motion smooth and rapid.<br>
<br>
LONG=
 RACK and SHARP EDGE disappeared through the panel in the cieling<br>
of th=
e lift, first LONG RACK hoisted himself up with his crane-like<br>
extended=
able arm, and then he helped SHARP EDGE up as well.<br>
<br>
As they closed=
 the panel it left CONVOY, MACH KICK, BREAK and TUSCON<br>
alone in the lif=
t as it began to slow and then finally stop.<br>
<br>
As the door slid open=
 it revealed a long hall ahead of them as well as<br>
one going in each dir=
ection left and right. From the looks of things<br>
it was the prison level=
 but this one was different, darker and older.<br>
<br>
Two SHARKTICONS wer=
e standing at the door, thier optics wide with<br>
surprise and even terror=
, it was obvious that they had intended to<br>
take the lift themselves, un=
aware of the occupants.<br>
<br>
Two blasts from CONVOY sent them slamming =
back and sliding across the<br>
floor, thier chests smoking ruins, thier op=
tics going black!<br>
<br>
"Let's move!" He said as he stepped over the off=
line shells of the<br>
SHARKTICONS and began to run down the hall.<br>
<br>=

(TAG)<br>
<br>
Preston<br>
